mapper.update: update resource set rsc_value = #{value} where resource.rsc_seq = ( select resource.rsc_seq from resource_type where resource.rsc_type_seq = resource_type.rsc_type_seq and resource_type.rsc_type_group=#{rscGrp} and resource.dvc_seq = #{dvcSeq})
mapper.insert: insert into resource_log (rsc_log_value, rsc_seq) values ( #{value}, ( select resource.rsc_seq from resource, resource_type where resource.rsc_type_seq = resource_type.rsc_type_seq and resource_type.rsc_type_group=#{rscGrp} and resource.dvc_seq = #{dvcSeq}) )
